subject: Boxing
Amnesties, Commutations and Pardons
Blacks
Discrimination
United States Politics and Government
lead_paragraph: Over 100 years later, supporters of Johnson, boxing’s first black heavyweight champion, still seek a pardon for the fighter’s 1913 conviction on trumped-up charges.
snippet: Over 100 years later, supporters of Johnson, boxing’s first black heavyweight champion, still seek a pardon for the fighter’s 1913 conviction on trumped-up charges.
